value.excerpt: The new Watson suite will be available online and on smartphones and will be free for at least 90 days. value.title: Researchers Publish Survey of Explainable AI

value.title: IBM Cloud struggles, suffers small outage in Dallas

value.title: Artificial intelligence: IBM's Watson now understands idioms after 'sentiment' update
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence researchers at IBM have introduced a major upgrade to the famed Watson computer, allowing it to understand idioms and colloquialisms for the first time. IBM says the update makes it the first commercial AI system capable of identifying, understanding and analysing some of the most challenging aspects of the English language.
